documentation.text:
@dev Library for managing uint256 to bool mapping in a compact and efficient way, providing the keys are sequential.
 Largelly inspired by Uniswap's https://github.com/Uniswap/merkle-distributor/blob/master/contracts/MerkleDistributor.sol[merkle-distributor].
@dev Returns whether the bit at `index` is set.
@dev Sets the bit at `index` to the boolean `value`.

natspec.details: Library for managing uint256 to bool mapping in a compact and efficient way, providing the keys are sequential. Largelly inspired by Uniswap's https://github.com/Uniswap/merkle-distributor/blob/master/contracts/MerkleDistributor.sol[merkle-distributor].
